title: purakkavE avatarittAn
sahitya:
rAdhA mukha kamala madhu rasikam


anupallavi

  cEtO bhaja sadA yadutilakam


caraNam 1    sAdhu janAvana dhrta shishu rUpam smaraNa mAtra Hrudha smrti tApam
  caraNam 2    mAyA prapanca nATaka sUtra dhAram vraja gOdhULi dhUsarita sharIram
  caraNam 3    vidhimukha vinutham srutipira gaNitam dadhi navanItha surabi vadanam tam
